/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, divided by a median, is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the concrete jungle. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the rhythm of city life. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene.
